Articles.Content:
Has Voyager finally gone interstellar after 35 years?

http://www.space.com/17966-voyager-spacecraft-solar-system.html

I saw that earlier and posted it in the Space Exploration Discussion Thread.

I believe it has happened but there is still one more boundary to pass through, the Oort Cloud even further out.

That's probably a better place for it. Really must look harder before posting stuff!

The Oort cloud means a quarter way towards Proxima Centauri!

Go Voyager!

That's probably a better place for it. Really must look harder before posting stuff!

The Oort cloud means a quarter way towards Proxima Centauri!

Go Voyager!

Go Voyager indeed and RIP Pioneers, I hope the the Voyagers don't go the same way.
